hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"The Messenger of Allah [SAW] said: 'Whoever makes an image will be commanded on the Day of Resurrection to breathe the soul into it but he will not be able to do so

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ مَا يُكَلَّفُ أَصْحَابُ الصُّوَرِ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What the Image-Makers Will be Commanded to Do on the Day of Resurrection
